document_data.name: Irtana
document_data.mainbody: '''Irtana''' was the queen of the [[Kuro]] [[goblin]] tribe in [[Chult]].
document_data.History: Irtana was a powerful [[fighter]] and gained her power through combat.
document_data.Activities: Irtana ruled the village with an iron fist but her village prospered under her rule with a constant supply of slaves and sacrifices. All who doubted her orders were sent as sacrifices to the [[dinosaur]]s.
document_data.Personality: Irtana was cruel, enjoying tormenting lesser creatures and scaring slaves. However, she acted aloof and attentive with outsiders.
